thread.title: Pit bull shot dead after charging cop in park | New York Post
thread.title_full: Pit bull shot dead after charging cop in park | New York Post

author: Tina Moore
title: Pit bull shot dead after charging cop in park | New York Post
text:
A cop shot a pit bull in a Brooklyn park when the dog charged at him while the officer was helping to write the owner a summons, officials said Monday.
The officer and another cop were in Saratoga Park in Bedford Stuyvesant when they spotted the unleashed dog at about 7:30 p.m. Sunday. The cops were in the process of writing the dogâ€™s 53-year-old female owner a summons when the animal charged, authorities said.
One of the officers fired two bullets, striking the pet.
The dog was taken to Animal Care & Control in unknown condition, police said.
The officers were taken to the hospital for tinnitus. One of them had a cut on his thumb.
